Title: Fueling Hope
Author: টিম ব্যার্থ
Summary: Compiling the pronounced anecdotes from individuals of Bangladesh and other parts of the world, Team Bertho brings their book “Fueling Hope”. The words of wisdom and the sentences of concerned experiences uttered in this compilation weave inspiration and motivation into someone’s life. This book is an eloquent gesture to express Team Bertho’s love for the world and its people.
